Text: couldn't get it to work from disc. also, this appears to be the pal version.

Since there aren't any comments I'll say this, Its works 100% no issues at all! 

@narfdude - it isn't a PAL version, check your IOS, I'm running it in the latest version of cIOS249 rev 21. Though usually if you have issues running a game running it in cIOS222 fixes the problems.
